PROJECT CODE(A unique alphanumeric identifier assigned to each project for internal tracking and reference purposes. It is generally mentioned at the beginning of the RFP document or in the project summary section.)
PROJECT CATEGORY(Internal-This parameter indicates whether the project is internal, research-oriented, process improvement, or infrastructure-related, depending on internal usage)
PROJECT CATEGORY(Cust.Pr- It defines whether the project is customer-driven, client-specific, implementation, or service-based.)
INSPECTOR/CUSTOMER SEAL ON MASTER CARTONS(answer in yes or no)

OTHER ACCESSORIES(PlasticSeals or CrimpingLugs or Hologram)
CUSTOMER SUPPLIED(Seals or Hologram or Others or Cust Suppld Token)

BCS & CMRI S/W CDs QTY. / RATIO
